name: Jumbo Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: 1 tsp each baking soda, salt and cinnamon
instructions: Cream butter, peanut butter and sugars until smooth and creamy.
Add eggs, milk and vanilla and blend well.
Add flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon.
Drop by tablespoonfuls (or smaller) onto greased baking sheets about 2‚Äù apart.
